FAQ.section_description: Find answers to common questions about Modly.me.
FAQ.q1: Which social media platforms are supported?
FAQ.a1: We support popular platforms such as Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with real-time data integration.
FAQ.a2: Reports are automatically sent to your specified email address.
FAQ.q3: How is security and privacy ensured?
FAQ.a3: All data is encrypted with AES-256, and GDPR compliance is ensured.
FAQ.a4: The interface is available in multiple languages, including Turkish and English.
